title: OnePlus Nord TWS reportedly in development, design leaks
content:
OnePlus isn’t exactly a household brand when it comes to Bluetooth earphones. However, the company does have some solid wireless earbuds in the OnePlus Buds Z2 and OnePlus Buds Pro. According to a new leak, OnePlus wants to expand its audio portfolio with a new pair of true wireless earphones. A fresh leak from OnLeaks

The post OnePlus Nord TWS reportedly in development, design leaks appeared first on xda-developers.
description: According to a new leak, OnePlus is developing a new pair of true wireless earbuds under the Nord branding.
